The indices of the array start at 0 0 
at the bottom left, 8 8 at the top right
  -----------------
8| r n b q k b n r |
7| p p p p p p p p |
6|                 |
5|                 |
4|                 |
3|                 |
2| P P P P P P P P |
1| R N B Q K B N R |
  -----------------
   a b c d e f g h
